wogwt.translatable
Class TextBoxWithPlaceholder2

java.lang.Object
  Composite
      wogwt.translatable.TextBoxWithPlaceholder2

public class TextBoxWithPlaceholder2
extends Composite

A text box that displays a placeholder string when empty, even when focused

CSS Style Rules

  • .wogwt-TextBoxWithPlaceholder { primary style }
  • .wogwt-TextBoxWithPlaceholder-placeholder { style set on the the placeholder text }

cancelKey

public void cancelKey()
If a keyboard event is currently being handled on this text box, calling this method will suppress it. This allows listeners to easily filter keyboard input.
